backend/main.mo: Empty actor definition with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for the portfolio UI project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend source files used in the portfolio UI.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout combining background image, left-side category navigation, right-side vinyl player, and category overlay.
Dialog component showing category details with scrollable content and a close button.
frontend/src/components/VinylPlayer.tsx: Renders rotating vinyl image with an audio-backed play/pause button.
frontend/src/content/categories.ts: Exports category definitions containing names, descriptions, and detailed content blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and handles query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a placeholder hook that exposes actor and fetch status, with no backend queries implemented.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styling, CSS variables, dark mode theming, global styles, focus styles, and utility classes including animations and glassmorphism.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds asset URLs using the Vite base path, ensuring correct resolution for subpath deployments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and architectural notes for a static dark portfolio site with vinyl UI and interactive categories.
